title: Correction to: Redistribution of nitrogen to feed the people on a safer planet
content: This is a correction to: Helena Kahiluoto, Yousef Sakieh, Janne Kaseva, Kurt-Christian Kersebaum, Sara Minoli, James Franke, Reimund P Rötter, Christoph Müller, Redistribution of nitrogen to feed the people on a safer planet, PNAS Nexus, Volume 3, Issue 5, May 2024, pgae170, https://doi.org/10.1093/pnasnexus/pgae170
